name: Unstable Ground (BuzzyBee05)
description:
This guy made the music: Sample Motion - YouTube

You are a robot doing an intelligence and performance test. Be careful, the ground may have properties you don't expect.

Orange blocks do nothing
Grey blocks will fall when you step off them

Blue blocks will fall when you step on them

Pink blocks are blue blocks but slower

Green blocks are pink blocks but up

Also, when you run off a block, there is a short period of time in which you can still jump.
